info.title: Peddler Delivery as a Service API

id.description: Auto-assigned: Short Id is automatically generated

orderNumber.description: Auto-assigned: Order Number is automatically generated

orderAmount.description: Auto-assigned: Total order amount inc. taxes - must add up to each line item (totalAmount)

orderTaxAmount.description: Auto-assigned: Total lineitem taxes - must add up to each line item (taxAmount)

shippingAmount.description: Auto-assigned: Total shipping cost inc. taxes

shippingTaxRate.description: Auto-assigned: Tax amount in decimal point 21% = 0.21

discountAmount.description: Auto: Discount for this order inc. taxes (based on voucher)

commission.description: Auto-assigned: Total commission for order inc. taxes - must add up to each line item (commission)

currency.description: Auto-assigned: based on shipping address country

status.description: Auto-assigned: The STATUS is automatically assigned

unitPrice.description: Single item amount inc. taxes, must include variant cost

totalAmount.description: Total item amount inc. taxes: (unitPrice x quantity) - discount

taxAmount.description: Total tax amount for line item: totalAmount × (taxRate / (1 + taxRate))

taxRate.description: Tax rate as defined in the product for the lined item

deliveryShippingType.description: auto: deliveryShippingType TYPE is automatically assigned

unitPrice.description: Single item amount inc. taxes, must include variant cost

totalAmount.description: Total item amount inc. taxes: (unitPrice x quantity) - discount

taxAmount.description: Total tax amount for line item: totalAmount × (taxRate / (1 + taxRate))

taxRate.description: Tax rate as defined in the product for the lined item

deliveryStatus.description: Auto-assign: The STATUS is automatically assigned
